Collection.name: Records
Collection.type: Eamon.ThirdParty.BTree`1[[Eamon.Framework.IMonster, Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], Eamon, Version=1.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: giant rat

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large rat here. It appears to be nosing around, looking for something to eat.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small figure dressed in dark leather gear. He is armed with a hand axe.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a skeleton, and this one appears to be animated. It attacks with its sharp fingers.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a human who is aimlessly wandering around. He moves in your direction.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a creature that resembles a hairy goblin. Its skin is dirty yellow, and its hair is dingy brown. In its hand it carries a weapon.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see an evil-looking creature with long, sharp claws and a forked tongue. It sees you, and grimaces.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a humanoid creature with sharp claws, and a forked tongue. As it nears you, you smell an overpowering stench like that of rotting flesh.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a hideous creature with a muscular frame. It has a long forked tail, and a large horn in the middle of its forehead. When it sees you, it smiles with evil intent.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a swiftly fleeting shadow. A chill runs down your spine, and your hair stands on end as you realize that it's alive.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a brightly glowing sphere. It changes color (from violet to red to green) as it dances and flits around you.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: carrion crawler

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a creature that strongly resembles a cross between a green cutworm and a huge cephalopod. Many tentacles protrude from its head area, and its body is well armored.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: shambling mound

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a humanoid-shaped heap of rotting vegetation. It is tall (seven to eight feet), and has a wide girth. It lumbers toward you.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: ochre jelly

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large blob of jelly-like fluid creeping along the ground here.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a human, who reaches out to touch you. As he draws near, he appears to be transparent.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a giant rat-like creature. However, it is bipedal and can use its hands like humans.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a dark figure rise before you. It has a misty consistency, with two glowing points of light for eyes.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a humanoid, with a hairy body and the head of a jackal. It appears to be bipedal, and can fully use its hands.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large walnut tree growing next to the stream. Its long roots reach into the water, and deep into the ground.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: forest bloodnettle

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Growing next to one of the tombstones, you glimpse a large plant. It appears to be somewhat like a rose bush, complete with deep-red flowers.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: dark hood

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A grey, translucent, robed figure stands (or rather floats) next to the gravestone. Its cowled face is completely hidden in shadow.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: whip weed

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a strange plant growing next to the path. It has two thin whip-like stalks, each measuring about 10 feet in length, growing from a roughly spherical, gourd-like base.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: animated suit of armor

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a suit of plate mail, which seems to be moving along on its own. It advances towards you, in a most threatening manner.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: pocket dragon

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You spot a three-foot long lizard which closely resembles a small green dragon. It is lazily resting upon its small hoard of "treasure".

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: crimson amoeba

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a puddle of red wine on the stone floor. However, it appears to be somewhat viscous - like an amoeba of some sort.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a small (one-foot tall) flying creature stooping over the deceased. It has greasy black hair, leathery bat-like wings, and glowing red eyes. Its right "arm" ends in a large bone-like extension that resembles a sword. **200

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: possessed cutlass

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large cutlass which moves under its own power. It darts to and fro - and approaches you swiftly.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: jade statue

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see that the first of the statues is finely crafted jade, and stands about six feet tall. It is sculpted in the shape of a humanoid with a tiger's head. The remaining statues are much like the first: one with the head of a rat, another with **201

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a floating creature with a spherical chitinous body. Atop the sphere are 10 eyestalks, while in its central area are a great eleventh eye and a large mouth filled with pointed teeth.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: giant crayfish

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large marine crayfish scuttle out of the water. It snaps its claws at you aggressively.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: water weird

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large creature, which is apparently made out of water! It rears up at you, forming a large transparent wall.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: giant scorpion

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a scorpion of enormous proportions here. It snaps its pincers at you, and scuttles in your direction!

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large creature sitting in the nest. It has the head, claws and wings of an eagle, and the body of a lion.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: small griffin

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Two small griffins, obviously under the care of the larger, also occupy the nest. One pokes its head over, peering at you intently. The other sits on the rim of the nest, and flaps its wings vigorously.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: Jaldi'al the lich

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Sitting on a throne made of wood is a skeletal figure, who wears a crown and a flowing robe. When it sees you, it motions to the two giant leopards, hollowly chuckling at you.

Simple.name: Name
Simple.value: jungle bekkah

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You hear a roar and, looking up at a rock overhead, catch a glimpse of an enormous black jungle cat. It has green eyes, long saber teeth, and razor-sharp claws. Leaping to the ground, it growls at you ferociously. Another cat, much **202

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A companion of yours, a fellow calling himself Reginald, waits here. He is clad in dark leather gear, and carries a mace.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: Another companion, Dubro, also waits here impatiently. He is tall and muscular, wears a flowing cloak, and leather armor. He's armed with a maul.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see Joque, a short stocky fellow with a long beard. He's dressed entirely in chain mail, and carries a long claymore.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: A final companion, the sly Trevor, leans heavily upon his wits for survival. He's armed with a dirk.

Simple.name: Desc
Simple.value: You see a large fiery creature floating before you, looking something like a genie. It appears to be grinning at you.

Collection.name: FreeUids
Collection.type: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[System.Int64, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089
